abstract: Another high-level executive has left Citigroup. Robert Morse, the chief executive of the banking giant’s institutional clients group for Asia Pacific, has left the firm “to pursue other opportunities,” the firm said on Friday.
lead_paragraph: Another high-level executive has left Citigroup. Robert Morse, the chief executive of the banking giant’s institutional clients group for Asia Pacific, has left the firm “to pursue other opportunities,” the firm said on Friday.

headline.main: Citi’s Asia Pacific Institutional Chief to Leave
